column2: where is the nearest indian restaurant .
column3: [ geo ] of ( [ * , distance ( geo , $location . current_location ) ] of sort ( distance ( geo , $location . current_location ) asc of @org.schema.Restaurant . Restaurant ( ) filter servesCuisine =~ " indian " ) ) [ 1 ] ;

column2: search for an chinese restaurant in LOCATION_0 with at least NUMBER_0 reviews .
column3: @org.schema.Restaurant . Restaurant ( ) filter aggregateRating . reviewCount >= NUMBER_0 && geo == LOCATION_0 && servesCuisine =~ " chinese " ;

column2: what is the rating for the pizzeria uno in LOCATION_0 ?
column3: [ aggregateRating.ratingValue ] of @org.schema.Restaurant . Restaurant ( ) filter geo == LOCATION_0 && name =~ " pizzeria uno " ;

column2: what is the rating of bermuda bar ?
column3: [ aggregateRating.ratingValue ] of @org.schema.Restaurant . Restaurant ( ) filter id == null ^^org.schema.Restaurant:Restaurant ( " bermuda bar " ) ;

column2: show me the location and name of the nearest mexican restaurant .
column3: [ geo ] of ( [ * , distance ( geo , $location . current_location ) ] of sort ( distance ( geo , $location . current_location ) asc of @org.schema.Restaurant . Restaurant ( ) filter servesCuisine =~ " mexican " ) ) [ 1 ] ;
